main.name: Prasanna Khanal
main.description: I eat, sleep, and breathe code — from crafting slick UIs in React to building solid APIs and databases. Full stack isn’t just my role, it’s my rhythm.
main.bio: Hi there! I’m Prasanna Khanal — a Full Stack Developer who eats, sleeps, and breathes code. With years of experience turning ideas into scalable digital products, I’ve worked with startups and solo projects, building everything from slick React frontends to powerful backend systems with Node and MongoDB. Along the way, I found my real passion: helping others grow as developers.Whether it’s solving real-world problems, sharing insights, or building cool projects, I’m all about delivering real value. Through hands-on tutorials and clear guidance, I help upcoming devs gain the skills and confidence they need to crush it in the real world. This isn’t just about code — it’s about community, growth, and turning passion into purpose.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be part of an exciting project or collaboration

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! Building the PAPA Fam as large as possible.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
